articles.description: 'I put on 30 pounds and went from being a guy who was in fighting shape to a guy who was wheelchair-bound, suffering from a rare muscular degenerative disease,' Mark told EW.
articles.content:
He is passionate about fitness.

articles.title: Ed Sheeran pulls pints and sings with locals at a pub in Birmingham - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ed, who is said to have a net worth of £153 million, treated himself to drinks at the in The Roost Pub in Small Heath, where you can get four pints for £8 or six shots of sambuca for £10.
articles.content:
Ed Sheeran shocked pubgoers in Birmingham on Sunday as he danced around singing with them before hopping behind the bar to pull pints.

articles.description: After the former Big Brother star gushed over the decade-long success of his TV show Tipping Point, Ben quipped: 'Josie, I barely last 10 minutes with most of the things that I do!'
articles.content:

articles.title: The Queen will limit the number of Jubilee events after battle with Covid - Daily Mail
articles.description: Her Majesty revealed that  fighting coronavirus in February has left her 'exhausted' in a video call with NHS staff and patients last week.
articles.content:
